job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Candidates that do not meet or exceed the minimum stated requirements (skills/experience) will be displayed to customers but may not be chosen for this opportunity. Minimum Requirements: 8 years Hands on development of Machine Learning. 4 years Provide administration support for ML environment (MLOps) which includes installation, configuration, upgrades and business continuity support in AWS Cloud 4 years Experience creating scripts to automate ML administration tasks, schedules, and deployment activities. 4 years Demonstrated experience with Linux administration and troubleshooting activities. 2 years Excellent oral and written communication skills. 2 years Effectively manage multiple responsibilities, prioritize conflicting assignments, and switch quickly between assignments, as required. 2 years Experience working in an agile sprint team. 2 years Prior experience with an HHS agency Educational Requirements: 4 years Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or Business or equivalent experience. Preferred AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty certification
